optional_parameters.name: page_offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset (0-based) of first element in the page.

optional_parameters.name: page_limit
optional_parameters.description: Max number of elements to return.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Results can be sorted by the id or any /data/{index}/attributes key.

optional_parameters.name: fields_line
optional_parameters.description: Fields to include with the response.

query: I need to monitor the vehicles currently moving in the central Berlin area with boundaries north=52.52411, west=13.41002, south=52.51942, east=13.41709 and could you list the details of the Red Line from the MBTA data?
